name: FC Adventure Island2
description:
As one of the most talked about game, The revision for the game can either take you back to the past, it will not ruin your memories. Because it is not a simple transplant, but a thorough revision.


All games use pixel picture production, props, maintaining the original style. The game is also relatively simple, our small team of just five days. If the game is to get public recognition, we will continue to update the game and ensure that the game permanently free, also thank you for your support.

Email: xiaoxiaogame@qq.com
